product_name: FENTY BEAUTY by RihannaSun Stalk'r Instant Warmth Bronzer
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeThe FENTY BEAUTY by Rihanna Sun Stalk'r Instant Warmth Bronzer is a longwear, transfer-resistant bronzing powder in 8 groundbreaking shades, each carefully curated to bring all skin tones to life with an instant sun-soaked glow.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstant sun-soaked glow that lastsTransfer-resistantEasy to blendSoft matte finish that lets skin look like skinLight-as-airKey IngredientsMango and papaya fruit extracts - to help give skin a natural, healthy-looking glow with every swipe.Formulated WithoutPhthalatesParabensItem 2592467How To UseFor an instant all-over bronzed glow, apply with the Cheek-Hugging Bronzer Brush 190.ARTISTRY PRO TIP:Sun Stalk'r is great for warming up-not necessarily deepening-your skin tone, giving it life! It has the right pigments to bring out the warmth in even the deepest skin tones.Layer two shades for extra bronzed-out dimension. Try a lighter bronzer shade for all-over glow, then add a deeper shade to sculpt cheekbones, jawline, temples, and the sides of your nose.IngredientsSynthetic Fluorphlogopite, Talc, Magnesium Myristate, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Mica, Dimethicone, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Polypropylsilsesquioxane, Silica, Diisostearyl Malate, Caprylyl Glycol, Dimethiconol, Phenoxyethanol, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Hexylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Lauroyl Lysine, Aqua/Water/Eau, Maltodextrin, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Fruit Extract, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sorbic Acid, Tin Oxide, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Manganese Violet (CI 77742), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77499, CI 77492).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: For an instant all-over bronzed glow, apply with the Cheek-Hugging Bronzer Brush 190.ARTISTRY PRO TIP:Sun Stalk'r is great for warming up-not necessarily deepening-your skin tone, giving it life! It has the right pigments to bring out the warmth in even the deepest skin tones.Layer two shades for extra bronzed-out dimension. Try a lighter bronzer shade for all-over glow, then add a deeper shade to sculpt cheekbones, jawline, temples, and the sides of your nose.

reviews.headline: I would always purchase
reviews.comments: Such a beautiful bronzer and stays for long.

reviews.headline: Buy it now
reviews.comments: I got the powder shade in da sun. This powder is so silky soft and blends beautifully. I have 6 bronzers and this one is the one. Not orange, shows up and no shimmer. I only spend alot on Fenty and Mac because they have the best products that are worth every penny.

reviews.headline: Favorite Bronzer
reviews.comments: I will never stoo buying this. A little goes a long way. I've had it since last year and its still not gone. I need to get the bronzer stick now.

reviews.headline: I would purchase again
reviews.comments: I've purchased two bronzers( mocha mami, thick mint because I couldn't decide which one would work great for me but both came out great on my skin. I love the smoothness and it blends so easily. I would recommend and also purchase again.

reviews.headline: Smooth
reviews.comments: I love this bronzer ! It goes on my skin just effortlessly with the makeup brush. It even out and discoloration too. It is a must have!

reviews.headline: On Repeat
reviews.comments: Fenty is just that girl.I love the pigment and the color payoff is amazing.Riri has the best products for complexion and never ever disappoints.I just ran out of his and had to repurchase right away.

reviews.headline: Beautiful shade!
reviews.comments: My go to bronzer, has a nice warm tone to it that compliments my skin very well. A wonderful formula that doesn't cake up, blends very well and easily. Goes well with just about any foundation formula.

reviews.headline: Lots of product. The perfect warmth
reviews.comments: Ive been using this bronzer since it first came out and i havent hit pan yet. This is my favorite bronzer out of the many i have. It adds the perfect amount of sunkissed warmth. Brings color back to my face

reviews.headline: Easy to use
reviews.comments: This formula is so soft and buttery. It applies pretty sure but builds up well and blends like a dream. I got the lightest color and it doesnt come off orange at all. The packaging is also very luxe, with a mirror, and the pan is very large

reviews.headline: SNATCHED UP!!!
reviews.comments: YESSSS!!! This brings my makeup together perfectly!!! I l love that you don't need a lotâ€¦this will last for a while! Definitely worth the hype and price!!!

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Great color for fair skin tones

reviews.headline: Fenty bronzer
reviews.comments: Im 50/50 about this product love it but just hard to blend.

reviews.headline: Loveeeee
reviews.comments: My favorite bronzer !!!!!!

reviews.headline: Beautiful!
reviews.comments: I have fair to light skin with a true neutral undertone. Many bronzers are too warm/orange. Inda Sun is very neutral, my skin looks sun-kissed, not orange, the product is smooth, applies well without patchiness.

reviews.headline: No contour
reviews.comments: The contour was nonexistent, which wasn't the products fault. That was the associate said that would be the best one. It was heavy I didn't blend well no contouring.

reviews.headline: Perfect for cool skin tones
reviews.comments: I am very fair and love this product in the shade Inda Sun. It's just about the only bronzer I've found that doesn't turn orange on me. I once went to a beauty store wanting to try a new bronzer just to switch things up, and the employee helplessly led me around swatching to coolest toned bronzers and contour products she could think of on me, only for them to all turn orange. I ended up leaving just repurchasing my tried and true Fenty bronzer.

reviews.headline: good but too orange
reviews.comments: i love fenty with my whole heart and this bronzer applies beautifully.. if you have a really warm skin tone, or else it looks pretty orange.

reviews.headline: Absolutely AMAZING!
reviews.comments: I had never used bronzer before in my life. This part of my makeup regimne is an absolute game changer! It brings back the warmth to my skintone and i love it!

reviews.headline: Just Okay
reviews.comments: I have tried sooo many bronzers and this one is just okay. The color is decent. It doesn't last very long and the finish isn't very pleasant. It melts off within an hour.

reviews.headline: So beautiful!!
reviews.comments: This blends so good and looks stunning!! I got so many compliments.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have to get the lightest shades for complexion products, so I bought Inda Sun. It's a gorgeous shade, it blends out really well, it's very creamy and soft to the touch, it's very matte on the skin but doesn't cling to any dry patches. The one thing I would change is that the shade is just a touch too warm for my skin. It's supposed to be neutral, but it's just a little bit too orange. It's nothing bad though, and I think it's mostly just my own undertones being so cool. Either way, I would absolutely buy this again because it's a wonderful product and the shade is only a tad off, not that noticeable. Packaging also feels nice and luxurious.
faceoff_positive.headline: Only one issue

faceoff_negative.comments:
This is just okay for me but really doesn't give me a better glow than a freebie I got from physicians formula. Maybe it's just too light. IDK.

FWIW - I am a light - medium, olive toned but on the warmer side. I wear Fenty 225.
faceoff_negative.headline: I don't hate it
